review.title: “It was a good experience.”
review.pros: Pros – Irrichi has one of the best training programs for aspiring managers and servers. Truly a great place to learn a tremendous amount about how to provide great service
review.cons: Cons – Management will work very long hours Monday-Saturday. The top manager loves to get managers to dislike each other so that they report any wrong doing (even something small like leaving to smoke a cigarette for 5 minutes when no one is at the restaurant).
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Work towards improving the food and work atmosphere and definitely give managers 2 days off a week.
